dailyTip.title: Tip of the Day
tips: Reflect on moments when you have already experienced complete congruence.
Take time today to look more closely at one area of your life wheel.
Try a small exercise from the 'Liveliness' area.
Identify a situation where thinking, feeling, and acting are not in harmony.
Implement a mini-step today towards your desired goals.
Ask yourself: 'When do I feel most alive today?'
Consciously practice inner and outer congruence in a challenging situation.
